page.title: 14Factory Work - Darwen
page.content: The working day of{Raymond Stanley {Addicott. Rise}6.30am;{drive}car to {William Morris Wallcoverings}- 5-10 minutes.{Start}7.30. { WORK:}mix ingredients for paint manufacture, pour materials into tanks for mixing (takes several hours), arrange continual consistency tests, prepare for flow of paint into tins, also, transfer various products to 'bean mills' for fine grinding { BREAKS:}spent in small room,drinking tea,smoking etc. { DINNER:}12.15-1pm in works canteen. Food good.Leisure room for table tennis or general relaxation. { Finish work}4pm. Journey home takes 10-20 minutes due to delays caused by mass exodus of workers.
